SEARCH

Alle Klassen und Schnittstellen

Klasse
Beschreibung
Cell
Represents a single cell on the game grid.
CellState
Represents the possible states of a cell on the game grid.
Controller
The controller class for the Battleship game, coordinating interactions between the model and the view.
Data
Represents the data structure for managing game-related information in the Battleship game.
GameState
All possible game states.
GifThread
A separate thread for loading GIF images in the background.
Grid
Represents the game grid with cells arranged in rows and columns.
IController
The interface representing the controller from the perspective of a view object.
IView
Interface defining the necessary methods for a view to be used by the controller in Battleship.
Main
The main class responsible for initializing and starting the Battleship game.
Model
Represents the model for playing Battleship in single-player mode against the computer.
ModelTest
 
Position
Represents a position on the game grid with vertical and horizontal coordinates.
Ship
Represents a ship in the Battleship game, consisting of multiple cells.
View
The View represents the graphical user interface for the Battleship game.
